blog.name: ao3feed-wolfstar
blog.title: remus x sirius ao3 feed
blog.description: (I don't actually read all these fics or choose what comes on the blog, it's literally just a feed of the ao3 ship tag sorry)

title: Strange Interlude
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Rg8o10

by lamentable

“He didn’t know where he was, and neither could he seem to recall the past several hours. All he remembered was the vague promise of meeting up with Potter to investigate a potential hideout of Montague’s. Potter. Of course this had something to do with him. Draco still didn’t know what had happened, but throttling that bastard senseless seemed like a good place to start.”

[After a case gone wrong, Hit-Wizard Draco and Auror Harry are accidentally transported to the distant past. While some might lay low and use their information to carefully manipulate the future, neither man has the ability to go unnoticed for long. They begin by breaking Sirius Black out of prison, and things go awry immediately after.]

Words: 6334, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Draco Malfoy, Harry Potter, Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, Hermione Granger, Ron Weasley, Albus Dumbledore, Severus Snape, Lucius Malfoy, Narcissa Black Malfoy, Gemma Farley
  • Relationships: Draco Malfoy & Harry Potter, Draco Malfoy/Harry Potter, Sirius Black/Remus Lupin
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Canon, Time Travel, Dark Comedy, Crack Treated Seriously, Werewolf Draco Malfoy, Auror Harry Potter, Developing Relationship, Things Go Wrong Immediately, Action/Adventure


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Rg8o10

blog.name: jenlizrose
blog.title: dat patronus doe
blog.description: 20 . Feminist . Gryffindor. England. Harry Potter & hand enthusiast. Role player it would seem.📌. insta: jen.elizabeth.rose.

body:
A concept:

So…Would anyone actually be down to do some Marauder/Harry Potter versions of scenes from The Office?? Drunk jen seems to have started something fun. Let me know if you’re interested :-D. We can do some stuff after the holidays ♡.

(If you want to be a specific character let me know :-) we can always do rotations)

blog.name: emerwenaranel
blog.title: A Janeite fangirling Huor
blog.description: My name is Mary, I am Jane Austen and Tolkien fan. I am here to fangirl Thranduil and Huor, my babies. Also, Sean Bean (I will try to keep you alive in the next movie, I promise).

summary: Glaurung, Ancalagon the Black, and Scatha the Worm. But all of them leave Tolkien’s world and they go to Harry Potter universe...
body: Glaurung, Ancalagon the Black, and Scatha the Worm. But all of them leave Tolkien’s world and they go to Harry Potter universe just to terrorise Harry. during the Triwizard Tournament. But this is the moment when Turin Turambar, Earendil the Mariner, and Fram of the Eotheod kill all those dragons, and Harry is saved.

tags: harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban
summary:
Summary: Remus is having a mood swings and got mad at the Reader but then the  Reader got into an accident.
Fandom:  Harry...
body:
Full Moon Moody (Remus x Reader)

Summary: Remus is having a mood swings and got mad at the Reader but then the Reader got into an accident.

Fandom: Harry Potter

Words: 1523 words

You woke up because of the rays that passes through your dormitory window. Groaning, you place your pillow to your face to avoid the blinding sunlight.

“What do you think your doing L/n?” You heard someone say and you gently open your eyes to see James staring at you with crossed arms. He’s wearing his Quidditch uniform and it strikes to you that you have a Quidditch match today.

You jolt up your bed and look at the time, It’s still early for the match and you let out a sigh, “Don’t scare me like that Potter.” You got up your bed and look for your uniform to change.

“What? I didn’t do anything, you know?” He replied and sat down to your bed playing with his own broomstick.

You’re both on the Gryffindor Team, him being the Seeker of the team and you a Chaser. It’s not that easy to be in the team and there are a lot of students who wants to be a Quidditch player but for you two it’s pretty basic because both of you are skilled in managing your brooms in the air, Even Professor McGonagall can see it in both of you.

Today, you’ll be playing agains Slytherin, They’re one of the most difficult house to compete because they do have a unique style of playing and great tactics. But you’ve got the advantage now because your team beats the Hufflepuff with 70 points along with extra 150 for James catching the snitch.

He can see the worry in your face, “Hey! Relax! we’ve got this!” He got up and put a hand on your shoulder.

“Do we? what if, what if we didn’t get the cup? what will the others say? what will Professor McGonagall feel?”

“We’ll be fine Y/n! We’ve got the higher ground here! Don’t worry! Now, get dressed. I’ll see you at the Common Room, Sirius and Remus are waiting for us at the Great Hall.” He finally said and went out of the dormitory.

After a few moments of contemplating and getting dressed, you went out of your dormitory at last with your broomstick at your hands. You and James climb to the portrait hole and walk down to the Great Hall.

When you enter you saw Sirius and Remus eating their breakfast. You approached the two and smiled at them, “Hey Sirius!” the boy smiled at you and you turn your gaze to Remus who’s still focus on his meal, “You okay Remus?”

“I’m fine, Thanks.” He said coldly and he didn’t even bother to look at you. ‘What’s with him?’ you thought but you push it aside and start to eat your breakfast before the match start.

Afterwards, You got up to say goodbye to the two boys but that didn’t end up well, “Remus we will go now, are you sure you’re okay?” You placed your hands to his but he quickly pulled away.

“I said I’m okay! Why do you have to be so annoying?” Out of nowhere, He shouted at you that made you startled and so was James and Sirius.

“I—I…Well, see you at the game, Come on James.” You shortly said and grab your broom then walk out of the Great Hall with James.

Both of you went to the locker room where other players are getting ready, suddenly you team captain spoke, “Okay listen up! We’ve only got one shot on this! Once we lose against Slytherin then that’s it! We won’t have the Quidditch Cup. You know what to do, we’ve been practicing for months! Now, why don’t we go up there we get that damn Cup?” Everyone in the locker room cheered and all of you went out of the field.

The field is surrounded by the students of four houses but Gryffindor and Slytherin’s cheer are far louder than the rest. You felt goosebumps all over your body, You can’t believe that they’re cheering for all of you! The Gryffindor Team!

You mounted your broom and hovered at the center of the field where all of you is waiting for the referee. After a few minutes, The quaffle is released together with the bludgers and you’ve easy got the quaffle and fly towards the goal post.

One of the Slytherin player bumped you and accidentally lose the hold of the ball and he caught it. You turned and chase the player then suddenly a bludger went pass the player and dropped the ball that you swiftly caught it and went straight to the goal post.

Cheers erupted when you throw the ball in one of the hoops meaning that Gryffindor got 10 points for it and the game goes on.

Gryffindor gets another 10 points, then Slytherin got hold of the ball. They avoided each of you and finally they shoot the ball and earned points.

The game goes on, no one is resting and all of you are now exhausted under the bright sky. Sweat running down your face, Gryffindor got 50 points while Slytherin got 40 and if the slytherin manage to shoot the quaffle then the scores are tie and the only chance you’ve got is for James to catch the snitch.

On the other side of the field, James is now watching out for the snitch. He can see the exhaust in the faces of his team mates. He need to get the snitch immediately if he want to end this game. Then unexpectedly, the snitch fly in front of him then went down. James didn’t hesitate and dive to catch the snitch, It’s unbelievably fast but he manage to stretch his hands. A bludger is coming straight at him and he quickly duck and continue to chase after the snitch. After a few minutes, He stretched again his hands and grab the cold metal ball.

You’re still hovering in the air when suddenly the whistle blows and you saw James raising his hands with the snitch in his fingers. The gryffindor students went wild, They won! They actually won!

You are in the middle of celebrating when you heard someone say, “Watch out Y/n!” but you’re too slow to react and a bludger hit you in the face knocking you off your broom and your vision went black.

Remus is currently at the library reading a book and staying out of trouble. Full moon is near and that makes him really uncomfortable and having mood swings that is really not helpful at the moment. He even shouted at you for no reason at all, He’s just got so angry all the time.

The library door burst open and he saw Sirius sweaty and catching his breath. He scanned the room and when he laid eyes on Remus he run towards him.

“Moony, You… You’ve got to come with me.” Remus looks confused.

“What happened?”

“It’s… It’s Y/n! She fell of her broom! It’s ten—” He didn’t let Sirius finish what he’s saying, He run out of the room and went straight to the hospital wing.

Madam Pomfrey just got out of the room when Remus get there, “Madam Pomfrey! where’s Y/n? is she alright?” He quickly asked.

“Yes Mr. Lupin she’s fine now, but she’s not yet awake. She fell 10 feet of the ground! Not to mention the bludger that hit her face and dislocating her nose. I’m really thankful to Mr. Black that he uses slowing charm to Ms. L/n.”

Remus feels like he’s so useless, he should’ve been there to save you! He should have been there to stop the bludger from hitting you and He shouldn’t have shouted you before you left.

He entered the Hospital wing and he saw you lying at the bed, James beside you.

“How is she?”

***

You open your eyes and you saw Remus, Sirius and James beside you, “What the hell happened?” You asked trying to get up but all you felt is pain all over your body.

“Please don’t move my love,” Remus said.

You can see the bags under his eyes that makes you worried, “Remus what happened to you? you look like you haven’t slept for days!”

“Oh hell yeah he haven’t! He’s been watching you for three days!” Sirius said munching what you thought is a Bertie Bott’s Every Flavour Beans.

“Wait, I’ve been sleeping for three days?!” they all nodded.

“I’m so sorry my love, I should have been there, I should have saved you! And I’m sorry for shouting at you! It’s just——The full moon is near and I can’t handle my ang—” You cut Remus when you placed your finger to the center of his lips.

“You don’t have to say sorry Rem, It’s not your fault. Okay?” He nodded, “Now, why don’t you come closer so I can kiss you? I’ve been asleep for three days.” He smiled and went closer to you and placed a sweet kiss on your lips.

“I’ve missed that, I love you Moony the Moody” Your eyebrows went up and down that makes him blushed so hard.

“I love you too Y/n”

—–

yeah i know it sucks :(

reblog.comment:

“You don’t have to say sorry Rem, It’s not your fault. Okay?” He nodded, “Now, why don’t you come closer so I can kiss you? I’ve been asleep for three days.” He smiled and went closer to you and placed a sweet kiss on your lips.

“I’ve missed that, I love you Moony the Moody” Your eyebrows went up and down that makes him blushed so hard.

“I love you too Y/n”

—–

yeah i know it sucks :(

trail.content_raw:
Full Moon Moody (Remus x Reader)

Summary: Remus is having a mood swings and got mad at the Reader but then the Reader got into an accident.

Fandom: Harry Potter

Words: 1523 words

You woke up because of the rays that passes through your dormitory window. Groaning, you place your pillow to your face to avoid the blinding sunlight.

“What do you think your doing L/n?” You heard someone say and you gently open your eyes to see James staring at you with crossed arms. He’s wearing his Quidditch uniform and it strikes to you that you have a Quidditch match today.

You jolt up your bed and look at the time, It’s still early for the match and you let out a sigh, “Don’t scare me like that Potter.” You got up your bed and look for your uniform to change.

“What? I didn’t do anything, you know?” He replied and sat down to your bed playing with his own broomstick.

You’re both on the Gryffindor Team, him being the Seeker of the team and you a Chaser. It’s not that easy to be in the team and there are a lot of students who wants to be a Quidditch player but for you two it’s pretty basic because both of you are skilled in managing your brooms in the air, Even Professor McGonagall can see it in both of you.

Today, you’ll be playing agains Slytherin, They’re one of the most difficult house to compete because they do have a unique style of playing and great tactics. But you’ve got the advantage now because your team beats the Hufflepuff with 70 points along with extra 150 for James catching the snitch.

He can see the worry in your face, “Hey! Relax! we’ve got this!” He got up and put a hand on your shoulder.

“Do we? what if, what if we didn’t get the cup? what will the others say? what will Professor McGonagall feel?”

“We’ll be fine Y/n! We’ve got the higher ground here! Don’t worry! Now, get dressed. I’ll see you at the Common Room, Sirius and Remus are waiting for us at the Great Hall.” He finally said and went out of the dormitory.

After a few moments of contemplating and getting dressed, you went out of your dormitory at last with your broomstick at your hands. You and James climb to the portrait hole and walk down to the Great Hall.

When you enter you saw Sirius and Remus eating their breakfast. You approached the two and smiled at them, “Hey Sirius!” the boy smiled at you and you turn your gaze to Remus who’s still focus on his meal, “You okay Remus?”

“I’m fine, Thanks.” He said coldly and he didn’t even bother to look at you. ‘What’s with him?’ you thought but you push it aside and start to eat your breakfast before the match start.

Afterwards, You got up to say goodbye to the two boys but that didn’t end up well, “Remus we will go now, are you sure you’re okay?” You placed your hands to his but he quickly pulled away.

“I said I’m okay! Why do you have to be so annoying?” Out of nowhere, He shouted at you that made you startled and so was James and Sirius.

“I—I…Well, see you at the game, Come on James.” You shortly said and grab your broom then walk out of the Great Hall with James.

Both of you went to the locker room where other players are getting ready, suddenly you team captain spoke, “Okay listen up! We’ve only got one shot on this! Once we lose against Slytherin then that’s it! We won’t have the Quidditch Cup. You know what to do, we’ve been practicing for months! Now, why don’t we go up there we get that damn Cup?” Everyone in the locker room cheered and all of you went out of the field.

The field is surrounded by the students of four houses but Gryffindor and Slytherin’s cheer are far louder than the rest. You felt goosebumps all over your body, You can’t believe that they’re cheering for all of you! The Gryffindor Team!

You mounted your broom and hovered at the center of the field where all of you is waiting for the referee. After a few minutes, The quaffle is released together with the bludgers and you’ve easy got the quaffle and fly towards the goal post.

One of the Slytherin player bumped you and accidentally lose the hold of the ball and he caught it. You turned and chase the player then suddenly a bludger went pass the player and dropped the ball that you swiftly caught it and went straight to the goal post.

Cheers erupted when you throw the ball in one of the hoops meaning that Gryffindor got 10 points for it and the game goes on.

Gryffindor gets another 10 points, then Slytherin got hold of the ball. They avoided each of you and finally they shoot the ball and earned points.

The game goes on, no one is resting and all of you are now exhausted under the bright sky. Sweat running down your face, Gryffindor got 50 points while Slytherin got 40 and if the slytherin manage to shoot the quaffle then the scores are tie and the only chance you’ve got is for James to catch the snitch.

On the other side of the field, James is now watching out for the snitch. He can see the exhaust in the faces of his team mates. He need to get the snitch immediately if he want to end this game. Then unexpectedly, the snitch fly in front of him then went down. James didn’t hesitate and dive to catch the snitch, It’s unbelievably fast but he manage to stretch his hands. A bludger is coming straight at him and he quickly duck and continue to chase after the snitch. After a few minutes, He stretched again his hands and grab the cold metal ball.

You’re still hovering in the air when suddenly the whistle blows and you saw James raising his hands with the snitch in his fingers. The gryffindor students went wild, They won! They actually won!

You are in the middle of celebrating when you heard someone say, “Watch out Y/n!” but you’re too slow to react and a bludger hit you in the face knocking you off your broom and your vision went black.

Remus is currently at the library reading a book and staying out of trouble. Full moon is near and that makes him really uncomfortable and having mood swings that is really not helpful at the moment. He even shouted at you for no reason at all, He’s just got so angry all the time.

The library door burst open and he saw Sirius sweaty and catching his breath. He scanned the room and when he laid eyes on Remus he run towards him.

“Moony, You… You’ve got to come with me.” Remus looks confused.

“What happened?”

“It’s… It’s Y/n! She fell of her broom! It’s ten—” He didn’t let Sirius finish what he’s saying, He run out of the room and went straight to the hospital wing.

Madam Pomfrey just got out of the room when Remus get there, “Madam Pomfrey! where’s Y/n? is she alright?” He quickly asked.

“Yes Mr. Lupin she’s fine now, but she’s not yet awake. She fell 10 feet of the ground! Not to mention the bludger that hit her face and dislocating her nose. I’m really thankful to Mr. Black that he uses slowing charm to Ms. L/n.”

Remus feels like he’s so useless, he should’ve been there to save you! He should have been there to stop the bludger from hitting you and He shouldn’t have shouted you before you left.

He entered the Hospital wing and he saw you lying at the bed, James beside you.

“How is she?”

***

You open your eyes and you saw Remus, Sirius and James beside you, “What the hell happened?” You asked trying to get up but all you felt is pain all over your body.

“Please don’t move my love,” Remus said.

You can see the bags under his eyes that makes you worried, “Remus what happened to you? you look like you haven’t slept for days!”

“Oh hell yeah he haven’t! He’s been watching you for three days!” Sirius said munching what you thought is a Bertie Bott’s Every Flavour Beans.

“Wait, I’ve been sleeping for three days?!” they all nodded.

“I’m so sorry my love, I should have been there, I should have saved you! And I’m sorry for shouting at you! It’s just——The full moon is near and I can’t handle my ang—” You cut Remus when you placed your finger to the center of his lips.

“You don’t have to say sorry Rem, It’s not your fault. Okay?” He nodded, “Now, why don’t you come closer so I can kiss you? I’ve been asleep for three days.” He smiled and went closer to you and placed a sweet kiss on your lips.

“I’ve missed that, I love you Moony the Moody” Your eyebrows went up and down that makes him blushed so hard.

“I love you too Y/n”

—–

yeah i know it sucks :(

body:
For #harrypotter fans who want to make their own wands, here’s a DIY for you!

Konnichassuu!

Happy happy Christmas to one and all! May this Christmas be filled with cheer for you and your family!

Christmas for me, as I write this, is pretty much like a normal day. The weather has been good unlike the past few days which has been raining like hell. Though, its due to the Low Pressure Areas entering the country. The kids pretty much gotten the gifts this year, which is ok.…

tags: you said happy hanukkah so i assumed you wanted them celebrating hanukkah
summary: Happy Hanukkah!! Can you do something for Draco and Luna celebrating??
question: Happy Hanukkah!! Can you do something for Draco and Luna celebrating??
answer:
There are other Jewish students at Hogwarts of course, even ones he knows, but he’s not willing to hang out with someone just because they’ve been going to the same temple since they were kids. 

“Hurry up!” he says, “Come on, if you hurry I’ll let you light the menorah tonight.” 

Luna finishes throwing on her scarf and coat, then slips her hand into his, beaming. “Ready, cousin?”

He’s been waiting for her for twenty minutes. He needs a new family. Or maybe just more Jewish friends.

summary: Hag sameach! Some Lucius/Narcissa, perhaps? or a continuation of any of your 3-sentence series :) Thank you!
question: Hag sameach! Some Lucius/Narcissa, perhaps? or a continuation of any of your 3-sentence series :) Thank you!
answer:
He doesn’t touch her that first night. They chose each other, but it was rushed, it was faster than they wanted it to be. They were told now or never, and they chose now, even though Narcissa hasn’t even graduated Hogwarts yet and Lucius is months away from completing his barrister exam. 

“We can wait,” he says on the second night, a valley of space between them, in this large bed that’s already starting to feel too large. “You’re my wife, it’s not like you’re going anywhere, there’s no rush.” 

She pushes herself forward, crosses the valley of space between them and lays her head on his chest. “Okay. We can wait if you want.” 

He hesitates, then kisses the top of her head. “Thanks.”

She pushes herself forward, crosses the valley of space between them and lays her head on his chest. “Okay. We can wait if you want.” 

He hesitates, then kisses the top of her head. “Thanks.”

summary:
Snape being a vampire isn't even a secret though
Then what do you do exactly?
body:
Snape being a vampire isn’t even a secret though

Then what do you do exactly?
